name: Arsh Yog Avam Jan Kalyan Trust
briefDescription: Arsh Yog Avam Jankalyan Trust has been active in upliftment of women,children,youth,elderly,persons with disablities,Ayurvedic Medicines to needy people. Achievements:-1.Imparted Free Ayurvedic medicines to the needy people in various villages2.Working for Health Programmes3.Women Empowerment4.Working in Rural areas5.Yoga camps in rural and urban areas6.Making Youth Skilled7.Helping women in distress,against domestic violence8.Making Green India - Planting plants9.Imparting Free Education to Weaker Section of society10.Free Coaching to SC/ST11.Free Coaching to Backward Class12.Free Beauty Parlour Courses13.Free Computer Classes14.Imparting Personality Development ClassThousands of people have been served in various categories
